QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, cbk_gl_allocation_detail.id odf_pk, cbk_gl_allocation_detail.gl_account_id as gl_account_id, cbk_gl_allocation_detail.department_id as department_id, cbk_gl_allocation_detail.flat_amount as flat_amount, resourcecredit_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, (select fin_period_code from entity where id = (select entity_id from cbk_gl_allocation where id = cbk_gl_allocation_detail.GL_ALLOCATION_ID)) as periodtype, CBK_GL_ALLOCATION.entity_id as entity_id, created.full_name as created_by, resourcecredit_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, updated.full_name as last_updated_by, cbk_gl_allocation_detail.percentage as percentage, cbk_gl_allocation_detail.GL_ALLOCATION_ID as resourcecredit_id, cbk_gl_allocation_detail.weightage as weightable, CBK_GL_ALLOCATION_DETAIL.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_resourcecreditdetail.partition_code as partition_code, CBK_GL_ALLOCATION_DETAIL.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, (select entity from entity where id = (select entity_id from cbk_gl_allocation where id = cbk_gl_allocation_detail.GL_ALLOCATION_ID)) as entity from cbk_gl_allocation_detail cbk_gl_allocation_detail JOIN cbk_gl_allocation CBK_GL_ALLOCATION ON CBK_GL_ALLOCATION.id=CBK_GL_ALLOCATION_DETAIL.gl_allocation_id JOIN odf_ca_resourcecreditdetail odf_ca_resourcecreditdetail ON odf_ca_resourcecreditdetail.id=cbk_gl_allocation_detail.id JOIN (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, cbk_gl_allocation.id odf_pk, odf_ca_resourcecredit.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_resourcecredit.odf_period_start as odf_period_start from cbk_gl_allocation cbk_gl_allocation JOIN odf_ca_resourcecredit odf_ca_resourcecredit ON odf_ca_resourcecredit.id=cbk_gl_allocation.id where 1 = 1 ) resourcecredit_id ON resourcecredit_id.odf_pk=cbk_gl_allocation_detail.GL_ALLOCATION_ID , SRM_RESOURCES created, SRM_RESOURCES updated where CBK_GL_ALLOCATION_DETAIL.CREATED_BY = created.USER_ID AND CBK_GL_ALLOCATION_DETAIL.LAST_UPDATED_BY = updated.USER_ID
